JONNY'S GAMES

About

A solo horror game developer that explores themes such as the paranormal, cryptids, the occult, and the psychological. I take heavy inspiration from horror movies, mainly the found footage genre. Gameplay tends to lean heavily towards walking simulators or survival horror but always focuses on building an immersive and scary experience for the player.
